q: spark for Detroit Red after a slow start, winning his first game since joining the Pistons, 100-92 over the Sacramento Kings on Tuesday night.`` It was a huge lift off of me,'' Allen Iverson said. I knew it would happen. You think every game you go out and play it's going to happen. It feels good. I wanted to get the monkey off my back. I'm just excited that I got my first win and I can now try to get a lot more. Tayshaun Prince added 26 points and 11 rebounds for the Pistons, who had lost their first two games since acquiring Allen Iverson from Denver last week for All-Star point guard Chauncey Billups , key reserve Antonio McDyess and Cheikh Samb . led by as many as 17 in the first half but surrendered the lead in the third quarter. Allen Iverson said a 35-foot 3-pointer at the third-quarter buzzer, that tied it at 78, was the turning point. I hadn't hit anything all game, and then I make the bomb at the end of the third. I've been around long enough to know to keep on playing and fighting and that's what I did. Allen Iverson 's 10-foot jumper gave the Nuggets an 82-81 lead in the fourth quarter against Portland. JR Josh Smith added a 3-pointer and Linas Kleiza 's dunk extended the lead to six. of key talent to rival Facebook is another sin often laid at Eric Schmidt 's feet. The reason for the exodus, many say, is that the company is no longer technically innovative enough. .`` Larry, in my clear opinion, is ready to lead.'' Eric Schmidt has made headlines in the past year with a number of controversial statements about privacy. humbled by the confidence and support of those who believe we should pursue the presidency, but after much deliberation and prayer, we believe our calling is closer to home,'' Mr. Mike Pence wrote in the letter. In the choice between seeking national office and serving Indiana in some capacity, we choose Indiana. We will not seek the Republican nomination for president in 2012.
